name: Wrap-It-Up!! (Lite)
description:
Avoid ghosts and wrap gifts in this maze style arcade game.

Wrap-It-Up!! (Lite) includes all 100 levels to randomly challenge in an arcade mode. Try to survive for as long as possible while achieving a high score. Earn tokens to buy power-ups along the way, and strategize to survive the night and save the day.

Gamepad is recommended.
